summary: The conversation is between a customer service representative from a peer-to-peer (P2P) lending platform and a customer. The customer service representative is reaching out to the customer to inquire about any doubts or queries they might have regarding their investments.
questions_asked: - The customer service representative asked the customer if they have any doubts or queries regarding their investments.
overall_sentiment: Neutral. The customer did not express any concerns or questions, and the conversation remained polite and professional.
